description:
Imported Radio is a well designed and thought-out application that plays Digitally Imported stations. Not only does this application support the free streams, but it also supports Premium Streams!

For those of you who have not heard of Digitally Imported (www.di.fm), it is the largest electronic music streaming website on the Internet (that we know of :-p). They feature live broadcasts and shows playing the latest and greatest of all the top global and emerging artists in this genre. If you enjoy this type of music, then this application is a great resource for you.

This application includes the following features:
-Premium Login Options
-AAC/PLS Stream Formats
-High Bit-rate Stream Availability w/ Premium Access (256k/pls & 64k aac)
-Favorite Stations
-Auto Play on App Open (very handy for driving!)
-Current Song Notifications
-Dynamic Listing with No App Update Needed(ie; if di.fm adds a station)
-App Update Notification
-Professional Design
-Static Total Listeners/Current Track Information for all Stations
-Many more to come!
versionNote: Just updated the location of our server, probably won't be seeing much speed increase but the server that we're using is on a 150mbit connection. There are future plans! Got any ideas you want to see? Send us an email.
